Question: This person was awarded a BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role for her work.
Hints: In She-Devil (1989), this person played her first comedic film role, opposite Roseanne Barr.
This person was living in New York City with Cazale, who had been diagnosed with bone cancer.
Lauded by critics and viewers alike, the film won this person her fourth Golden Globe in the Best Supporting Actress category.
